name: MINECIRCUIT
description: MINECIRCUIT is the circuit simulator.  Lets make the original circuit by combining parts freely. It is using Mini 4WD Japan Cup Junior Circuit.  [function] *course add *course delete *course move *course group move *course rotate *circuit zoom *circuit save *circuit delete *circuit name edit *circuit copy *circuit post to concours dElegance  [[[NOTE]]] * Please become a premium user after install the app concours dElegance. * Please enter the Account-Code in the MINECIRCUIT. * Please use the latest models.
